etymology.description: 人(人) (rén, "person") + 厂(厂) (chǎng, "cliff") = person below a cliff -> implying danger
etymology.interpretation: The character 厃(wěi, "danger") graphically combines a person and a cliff, symbolizing the inherent risk of being under a precarious structure. It visually conveys the idea of peril or vulnerability in this context.
